short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your cursor movement across tabs and browsing sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover how much your mouse travels with Cursor Path! This Chrome extension tracks the distance your mouse moves across web pages, providing daily, lifetime, and 5-day average statistics. Easily view your cursor movement history and detailed metrics, including real-world distance equivalents. Perfect for understanding your browsing habits, Cursor Path helps you visualize your activity and see just how far your cursor journeys each day. Keep an eye on your mouse movements and gain insights into your web surfing patterns with Cursor Path.
